Class QuizServerImpl

  • java.lang.Object

          • mach2.QuizServerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, QuizServer

extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements QuizServer, java.io.Serializable
